name: get_generic_object
description: Returns basic info on object of any type

unselect_evidence.description: If true, excludes evidence objects in response

exclude_automatic_assertions.description: If true, excludes associations that involve IEAs (ECO:0000501)

fetch_objects.description: If true, returns a distinct set of association.objects (typically ontology terms). This appears at the top level of the results payload

use_compact_associations.description: If true, returns results in compact associations format

slim.description: Map objects up (slim) to a higher level category. Value can be ontology class ID or subset ID

evidence.description: Object id, e.g. ECO:0000501 (for IEA; Includes inferred by default) or a specific publication or other supporting object, e.g. ZFIN:ZDB-PUB-060503-2

direct.description: Set true to only include direct associations, and false to include inferred (via subclass or subclass|part of), default=False

$ul: **deprecated**: True if the node is deprecated/obsoleted.
**description**: Descriptive text for the entity. For ontology classes, this will be a definition.
**synonyms**: list of synonyms or alternate labels
**xrefs**: Database cross-references. These are usually CURIEs, but may also be URLs. E.g. ENSEMBL:ENSG00000099940
